ca.concordia.soen6441.persistence.dao.interfaces

Interface IGenericDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    INamedEntityDao<T,PK>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JpaGenericDao, JpaNamedEntityDao

    public interface IGenericDao<T,PK extends java.io.Serializable>
    An interface for CRUD operations. The underlying persistence technology should implement this methods
    Author:
    Saman Saadi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T create(T t)
      Create a new record into non-volatile storage
      void delete(T t)
      Delete a record from non-volatile storage
      T read(PK id)
      Read a new record form non-volatile storage
      T update(T t)
      Update an existing persisting record

    • Method Detail

      • create

        T create(T t)
        Create a new record into non-volatile storage
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        persistent record

        Read a new record form non-volatile storage
        Parameters:
        id - The primary key of the record
        Returns:
        persistent record

        T update(T t)
        Update an existing persisting record
        Parameters:
        t - the record that should be persist
        Returns:
        persistent record

        Delete a record from non-volatile storage
        Parameters:
